hero.title: The Operating System for the Agentic Enterprise
hero.subtitle: Move beyond chatbots. Build, deploy, and govern autonomous AI agents that reason, collaborate, and execute at scale. We provide the unified layer for production-grade autonomy.

cognitiveTurn.title: The Cognitive Turn: From Generative to Agentic
cognitiveTurn.subtitle: We are navigating a pivotal inflection point from stateless reasoning engines to autonomous workers with agency. The era of fragmented 'GPT wrappers' is over.

features.title: Unified Operating System
features.desc: A single fabric where agents share memory, tools, and goals, solving the 'Box of Parts' fragmentation problem.

features.title: SHIELD Governance
features.desc: Deterministic guardrails and real-time threat interception to eliminate 'Shadow AI' risks.

features.title: LLM Mesh Agnosticism
features.desc: Virtualization that decouples agents from underlying models. Swap GPT-4, Claude, or Llama without rewriting logic.

platformKeyPoints.title: Kendra Workbench: No Black Boxes
platformKeyPoints.content: The first IDE designed specifically for the Agentic lifecycle. Features bidirectional synchronization between a Visual Builder and Python SDK. Your visual map IS the code.

platformKeyPoints.title: Agentic Mesh: The Nervous System
platformKeyPoints.content: Utilizes the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to allow disparate agents to collaborate seamlessly. Every new agent increases the capabilities of the entire ecosystem.

platformKeyPoints.title: SHIELD: Active Governance
platformKeyPoints.content: Beyond simple filters. SHIELD provides Governance as Code, enforcing intent, preventing goal hijacking, and providing tamper-evident audit trails.

platformKeyPoints.title: Outcome-Based Economics
platformKeyPoints.content: Don't pay for seats; pay for results. Our pricing scales only when your agents successfully complete verified business workflows.

cta.title: Ready to engineer autonomy?
cta.subtitle: Join the world's leading firms migrating from experimental chatbots to production-grade agentic systems.
